document.bingtitle: McDonald's drive through line cutter gets tased LOL - AR15.COM
document.webtitle: McDonald's drive through line cutter gets tased LOL - AR15.COM
document.description: why would you want to cut in line? they wont even have your order? sounds like laquisha ... If cops can't resolve someone cutting in line at a fast food restaurant without ...
document.body:

Forgot Password Login ? Tools AR15.Com 3 Gun Nation Archery Store Join The NRA 5,164 Online AR-15 AK-47 Handgun Armory Training General Outdoors Hometown Industry Equipment Exchange Archives Conduct Code General General Discussion Gloftoe John_Wayne777 joker581 krpind mcculver5 Tango7 [ARCHIVED THREAD] - McDonald's drive through line cutter gets tased LOL (Page 1 of 4) ARCHIVED Previous Page Page: - 1 - - 2 - - 3 - - 4 - / 4 Next Page Author Message AssaultRifler Get off my lawn Team Member Joined: Sep 2004 USA Posts: 30396 Feedback: 100% (87) Posted: 2/4/2012 8:16:29 PM THE IMAGE ABOVE IS A PAID ADVERTISEMENT http://www.fayobserver.com/articles/2012/02/03/1155055?sac=fo.local
Hope Mills, N.C. Authorities had to use a stun gun Friday on a woman who cut the drive-thru line at a Cumberland County McDonald's and became argumentative when employees wouldn't take her order. McDonald's workers told deputies that the woman bypassed the order screen and the first drive-thru window, where customers pay for their orders, and went straight to the pick-up window at the restaurant, at Legion Road and Black and Decker Road in Hope Mills. The woman had a 3-year-old child in the car with her and asked if she could order and pay at the pick-up window, authorities said. When McDonald's employees told her that they didn't have a register at that window and she needed to go to the back of the line, she refused. The woman blocked the line for 20 minutes, refusing to move, before workers called Cumberland County deputies. Debbie Tanna, a spokeswoman for the Cumberland County Sheriff's Office, said the woman became belligerent when deputies arrived, and they had to use to Taser on her to subdue her and take her into custody.
<snip> "Two or three officers entered the car with her and started trying to forcibly drag her out of the car, and that's when you could hear the clicking sound of the Taser one time,"Rich said."They pulled on her a couple of times, and then they Tased (stunned) her again, and when they Tased (stunned) her the second time, she just flopped out of the car like a fish.
<snip>
"Bullets change governments far surer than votes.."- Lord of War 2005
"The trouble with socialism is that you eventually run out of other people's money"Margaret Thatcher
